name: Game of Life (itch) (Roberto Herencias Muñoz)
description:
Game of Life

Simple videogame programmed in Javascript as a university project (It is a programming challenge, making use of CPU cycles).

Based on the Game of Life by John Horton Conway (1970).

It is a 0-player game, where by means of patterns and very simple rules the game advances in state without the need for subsequent data input.
